page.title: 14Residential Care
page.content: Selwyn House provides residential accommodation for lonely, single and inadequate people. Childrens Homes at Garfield House (10 places) and Sandy Lane (9 places) are both run by the Norfolk Council. Cross Roads Scheme provides care for disabled and elderly people in their own homes. St. Nicholas Old Peoples Home cares for 46 residents, and the Friends of St. Nicholas Home befriend, and arrange entertainment for the residents, and raise money for comforts not supplied by the County Council.
